original: idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam mettā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.
analyzed: karuṇā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ karuṇāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam karuṇā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.
analyzed: muditā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ muditāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam muditā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Kathañca bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhu mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati

original: Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṁ puggalaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ disvā mettāyeyya;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api nāma ekam puggalam piyam manāpam disvā mettāyeyya
evam eva sabbe satte mettāya pharati

original: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṁ mettācetovimutti—
analyzed: yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettā āyitattam mettā cetaḥ vimutti

original: Yaṁ cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
analyzed: yam cittam manaḥ mānasam hadayam paṇḍaram manaḥ man āyatanam man indriyam viññāṇam viññāṇa kkhandhaḥ tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Idaṁ cittaṁ imāya mettāya sahagataṁ hoti sahajātaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ sampayuttaṁ.
analyzed: idam cittam imāya mettāya sahagatam hoti sahajātam sa saṭṭham sampayutta
tena vuccati mettā sahagatena cetasā ati

original: “Ekaṁ disan”ti puratthimaṁ vā disaṁ pacchimaṁ vā disaṁ uttaraṁ vā disaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ vā disaṁ uddhaṁ vā adho vā tiriyaṁ vā vidisaṁ vā.
analyzed: ekam disanti puratthimam vā disam pacchimam vā disam uttaram vā disam dakkhiṇam vā disam uddham vā adhas vā tiriyam vā vidisam vā

original: “Viharatī”ti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati.
“Tathā dutiyan”ti yatheva ekaṁ disaṁ tathā dutiyaṁ disaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ disaṁ tathā catutthaṁ disaṁ tathā uddhaṁ tathā adho tathā tiriyaṁ tathā vidisaṁ.
analyzed: tathā yathā iva ekam disam tathā dutiyam disam tathā tatiyam disam tathā catuttham disam tathā uddham tathā adhas tathā tiriyam tathā vidisa

original: “Sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokan”ti sabbena sabbaṁ sabbathā sabbaṁ asesaṁ nissesaṁ.
analyzed: sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokanti sabbena sabbam sabbathā sabbam asesam

analyzed: yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettā āyitattam mettā cetaḥ vimutti
yam cittam manaḥ mānasam pe tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Idaṁ cittaṁ imāya mettāya sahagataṁ hoti sahajātaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ sampayuttaṁ.
analyzed: idam cittam imāya mettāya sahagatam hoti sahajātam sa saṭṭham sampayutta
tena vuccati mettā sahagatena cetasā ati

upekkhāyanā upekkhāyi tattaṃ upekkhā cetas vimutti

original: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṁ tathā
analyzed: idha bhikkhu mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyam tathā

original: tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ
analyzed: tatiyam tathā catutthe iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya

original: lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

original: Karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

original: Muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ
analyzed: muditā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam viharati tathā dutiyam tathā

original: tathā catutthaṁ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ muditāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam muditā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyam tathā tatiya

original: tathā catutthaṁ, iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena pharitvā viharati

original: Catunnaṁ appamaññānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
analyzed: catunnam appamaññānam kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatā pe kati saraṇā kati araṇā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, upekkhā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
analyzed: tissaḥ appamaññāyo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ upekkhā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: Siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā.
analyzed: siyā vipākā siyā vipāka dhamma dhammā siyā neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā;
analyzed: tisso appamaññāyo siyā sa vitakka sa vicārā siyā a vitakka vicāra mattā siyā a vitakka a vicārā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, na upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na vattabbā pītisahagatāti;
analyzed: tisso appamaññāyo siyā pīti sahagatā siyā sukha sahagatā na upekkhā sahagatā siyā na vattabbā pīti sahagatā ti
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā
siyā ācaya gāmino siyā na iva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmino
na vattabbā paritta ārammaṇā atipi mahaggata ārammaṇā atipi appamāṇa ārammaṇā atipi
na vattabbā magga ārammaṇā atipi magga hetukā atipi magga adhipatino tipi

original: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.
analyzed: siyā uppannā siyā anuppannā siyā uppādinaḥ

original: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
analyzed: siyā atītā siyā anāgatā siyā paccuppannā
na vattabbā atīta ārammaṇā atipi anāgata ārammaṇā atipi paccuppanna ārammaṇā atipi

original: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
analyzed: siyā ajjhattā siyā bahiddhā siyā ajjhatta bahiddhā

original: Mettā hetu, tisso appamaññāyo na hetū, sahetukā, hetusampayuttā.
analyzed: mettā hetu tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ na hetū sa hetukā hetu sampayuttā

original: tisso appamaññāyo na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ na vattabbāḥ hetū ca iva sa hetukā ca ati sa hetukā ca iva na ca hetū
mettā hetu ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca

original: tisso appamaññāyo na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ na vattabbāḥ hetū ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca ati hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetū
tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ na hetū sa hetukā

original: mettā na vattabbā “na hetu sahetukā”tipi, “na hetu ahetukā”tipi.
analyzed: mettā na vattabbā na hetu sa hetukā atipi na hetu ahetukā atipi

original: Sappaccayā, saṅkhatā, anidassanā, appaṭighā, arūpā, lokiyā, kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā.
analyzed: sa paccayā saṅkhatā anidassanā appaṭighā arūpā lokiyā kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā

original: No āsavā, sāsavā, āsavavippayuttā, na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”ti, sāsavā ceva
analyzed: no āsavā sa āsavā āsava vippayuttā na vattabbā āsavā ca iva sa āsavā ca ati sa āsavā ca iva

original: no ca āsavā, na vattabbā āsavā ceva “āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
analyzed: no ca āsavā na vattabbā āsavā ca iva āsava sampayuttā ca atipi āsava sampayuttā ca iva no ca āsavā atipi

original: Sārammaṇā, no cittā, cetasikā, cittasampayuttā, cittasaṁsaṭṭhā, cittasamuṭṭhānā,
analyzed: sa ārammaṇā no cittā cetasikā citta sampayuttā citta sasaṭṭhā citta samuṭṭhānā
citta sahabhunaḥ citta anuparivattinaḥ citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhunaḥ

original: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino, bāhirā, no upādā, siyā upādinnā, siyā anupādinnā.
analyzed: bāhirāḥ no upādā siyā upādinnā siyā anupādinnā

original: na dassanena pahātabbā, na bhāvanāya pahātabbā, na dassanena pahātabbahetukā, na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbā na bhāvanāya pahātabbā na dassanena pahātabba hetukā na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā;
analyzed: tisso appamaññāyo siyā sa vitakkā siyā a vitakkā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā;
analyzed: tisso appamaññāyaḥ siyā sa vicārā siyā avicārā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā;
analyzed: tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ siyā sappītikā siyā appītikā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā;
analyzed: tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ siyā pīti sahagatā siyā na pīti sahagatā

original: Tisso appamaññāyo sukhasahagatā, upekkhā na sukhasahagatā.
analyzed: tisso appamaññāyo sukha sahagatāḥ upekkhā na sukha sahagatā

original: Upekkhā upekkhāsahagatā, tisso appamaññāyo na upekkhāsahagatā, na kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā, na arūpāvacarā, pariyāpannā, aniyyānikā, aniyatā, sauttarā, araṇāti.
analyzed: upekkhā upekkhā sahagatā tissaḥ appamaññāyaḥ na upekkhā sahagatā na kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā na arūpāvacarā pariyāpannā aniyyānikā aniyatā sauttarā
